data.author: scammer
data.text: Hey mom, I’ve been trying to reach you. My phone died and I’m using a friend’s phone. I’m in a bit of a situation and need your help urgently. Please don’t tell dad yet, I don’t want him to worry.

data.author: scammer
data.text: Mom, are you there? I really need your help. I’m in trouble and I need some money to get out of this. Can you send $500 to my friend’s account? I’ll pay you back as soon as I can.

data.author: mom
data.text: Where are you exactly? What kind of trouble are you in?

data.author: scammer
data.text: Please hurry, mom. I don’t have much time. I’m so scared and I don’t know what to do. Just send the money and I’ll explain everything later.

data.author: scammer
data.text: Why aren’t you responding? I thought you would help me. I can’t believe this is happening. I’m so sorry to put you in this position, but I need you now more than ever.

data.author: mom
data.text: I need to hear your voice to make sure you’re okay. Call me immediately.
